descript: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
name: Staraptor

descript: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
name: Starly

descript: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
name: Bibarel

descript: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
name: Shinx

descript: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
name: Luxio

descript: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.
name: Luxray

descript: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
name: Budew

descript: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
name: Roserade

descript: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
name: Cranidos

descript: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
name: Rampardos

descript: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.
name: Shieldon

descript: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
name: Pachirisu

descript: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
name: Combee

descript: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.
name: Vespiquen

descript: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
name: Bastiodon

descript: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
name: Burmy

descript: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
name: Floatzel

descript: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
name: Mothim

descript: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
name: Buizel

descript: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
name: Cherubi

descript: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.
name: Cherrim

descript: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
name: Shellos

descript: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
name: Gastrodon

descript: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
name: Ambipom

descript: These Pokémon are called the “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.
name: Drifloon

descript: It’s drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
name: Drifblim

descript: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
name: Buneary

descript: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
name: Mismagius

descript: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
name: Purugly

descript: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
name: Lopunny

descript: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
name: Glameow

descript: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
name: Honchkrow

descript: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
name: Stunky

descript: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
name: Skuntank

descript: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
name: Bronzong

descript: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
name: Bonsly

descript: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
name: Mime-jr

descript: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
name: Happiny

descript: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
name: Chatot

descript: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
name: Spiritomb

descript: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
name: Gible

descript: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
name: Gabite

descript: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
name: Garchomp

descript: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
name: Drapion

descript: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.
name: Hippopotas

descript: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.
name: Hippowdon

descript: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
name: Lucario

descript: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
name: Munchlax

descript: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
name: Riolu

descript: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.
name: Skorupi

descript: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
name: Croagunk

descript: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.
name: Toxicroak

descript: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
name: Carnivine

descript: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.
name: Finneon

descript: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.
name: Lumineon

descript: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.
name: Mantyke

descript: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.
name: Snover

descript: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
name: Abomasnow

descript: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
name: Magnezone

descript: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
name: Yanmega

descript: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can’t even see its eyes.
name: Tangrowth

descript: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.
name: Rhyperior

descript: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.
name: Togekiss

descript: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
name: Electivire

descript: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
name: Leafeon

descript: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
name: Magmortar

descript: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
name: Lickilicky

descript: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
name: Glaceon

descript: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey… Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
name: Gliscor

descript: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
name: Mamoswine

descript: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
name: Gallade

descript: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
name: Probopass

descript: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
name: Dusknoir

descript: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.
name: Froslass

descript: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.
name: Rotom

descript: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.
name: Palkia

descript: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.
name: Uxie

descript: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.
name: Mesprit

descript: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
name: Dialga

descript: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
name: Heatran

descript: Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
name: Cresselia

descript: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.
name: Azelf

descript: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
name: Regigigas

descript: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.
name: Phione

descript: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
name: Manaphy

descript: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
name: Darkrai

descript: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.
name: Arceus

descript: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.
name: Victini

descript: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
name: Snivy

descript: When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.
name: Servine

descript: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.
name: Serperior

descript: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
name: Watchog

descript: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.
name: Emboar

descript: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
name: Samurott

descript: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.
name: Tepig

descript: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.
name: Dewott

descript: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.
name: Patrat

descript: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
name: Oshawott

descript: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
name: Pignite

descript: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
name: Herdier

descript: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.
name: Lillipup

descript: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
name: Stoutland

descript: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
name: Purrloin

descript: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
name: Liepard

descript: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
name: Pansage

descript: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
name: Simisage

descript: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Pansear

descript: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
name: Panpour

descript: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
name: Munna

descript: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
name: Simisear

descript: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
name: Musharna

descript: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
name: Pidove

descript: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
name: Unfezant

descript: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
name: Simipour

descript: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
name: Tranquill

descript: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
name: Zebstrika

descript: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
name: Roggenrola

descript: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
name: Boldore

descript: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
name: Gigalith

descript: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
name: Woobat

descript: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
name: Swoobat

descript: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
name: Drilbur

descript: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
name: Excadrill

descript: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
name: Sawk

descript: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
name: Conkeldurr

descript: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
name: Seismitoad

descript: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
name: Throh

descript: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
name: Palpitoad

descript: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
name: Gurdurr

descript: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
name: Timburr

descript: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
name: Audino

descript: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
name: Sewaddle

descript: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
name: Swadloon

descript: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
name: Venipede

descript: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
name: Leavanny

descript: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
name: Whirlipede

descript: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
name: Scolipede

descript: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
name: Cottonee

descript: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
name: Whimsicott

descript: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
name: Sandile

descript: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
name: Maractus

descript: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
name: Dwebble

descript: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Darumaka

descript: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
name: Krokorok

descript: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
name: Krookodile

descript: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
name: Petilil

descript: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
name: Lilligant

descript: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
name: Scraggy

descript: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
name: Crustle

descript: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
name: Scrafty

descript: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
name: Sigilyph

descript: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
name: Yamask

descript: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
name: Cofagrigus

descript: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
name: Tirtouga

descript: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
name: Carracosta

descript: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
name: Zorua

descript: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
name: Garbodor

descript: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
name: Archen

descript: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
name: Trubbish

descript: Cinccino’s body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
name: Cinccino

descript: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
name: Gothita

descript: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
name: Archeops

descript: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
name: Minccino

descript: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
name: Gothorita

descript: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers’ life spans.
name: Gothitelle

descript: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
name: Solosis

descript: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
name: Duosion

descript: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
name: Reuniclus

descript: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
name: Ducklett

descript: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
name: Swanna

descript: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
name: Vanillite

descript: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
name: Frillish

descript: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
name: Escavalier

descript: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
name: Deerling

descript: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
name: Vanilluxe

descript: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
name: Sawsbuck

descript: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.
name: Foongus

descript: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
name: Vanillish

descript: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
name: Karrablast

descript: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
name: Jellicent

descript: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
name: Alomomola

descript: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
name: Galvantula

descript: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
name: Joltik

descript: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
name: Ferroseed

descript: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
name: Ferrothorn

descript: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
name: Klink

descript: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn’t return, it will die.
name: Klang

descript: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
name: Litwick

descript: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
name: Eelektross

descript: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
name: Elgyem

descript: It uses psychic power to control an opponent’s brain and tamper with its memories.
name: Beheeyem

descript: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
name: Klinklang

descript: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
name: Lampent

descript: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
name: Eelektrik

descript: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
name: Tynamo

descript: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
name: Axew

descript: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
name: Fraxure

descript: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
name: Haxorus

descript: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
name: Cubchoo

descript: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
name: Beartic

descript: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Cryogonal

descript: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
name: Shelmet

descript: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
name: Accelgor

descript: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
name: Bisharp

descript: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
name: Pawniard

descript: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
name: Mienfoo

descript: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
name: Mienshao

descript: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
name: Stunfisk

descript: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
name: Druddigon

descript: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
name: Golurk

descript: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It’s been active for thousands of years.
name: Golett

descript: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
name: Rufflet

descript: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
name: Bouffalant

descript: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
name: Braviary

descript: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
name: Mandibuzz

descript: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
name: Vullaby

descript: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
name: Heatmor

descript: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
name: Durant

descript: Lacking sight, it’s unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
name: Deino

descript: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
name: Terrakion

descript: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
name: Virizion

descript: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
name: Hydreigon

descript: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
name: Zweilous

descript: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
name: Cobalion

descript: When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.
name: Reshiram

descript: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
name: Zekrom

descript: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
name: Genesect

descript: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.
name: Chespin

descript: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won’t start fights.
name: Quilladin

descript: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
name: Chesnaught

descript: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
name: Fennekin

descript: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
name: Braixen

descript: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
name: Delphox

descript: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
name: Froakie

descript: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
name: Bunnelby

descript: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.
name: Frogadier

descript: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
name: Scatterbug

descript: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it’s merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
name: Fletchling

descript: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
name: Fletchinder

descript: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
name: Greninja

descript: The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
name: Spewpa

descript: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.
name: Talonflame

descript: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
name: Vivillon

descript: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.
name: Litleo

descript: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.
name: Pyroar

descript: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind’s embrace with an untroubled heart.
name: Flabebe

descript: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
name: Floette

descript: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
name: Florges

descript: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
name: Skiddo

descript: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
name: Gogoat

descript: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person’s arm and drains that person’s life energy completely.
name: Honedge

descript: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.
name: Pangoro

descript: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.
name: Doublade

descript: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.
name: Espurr

descript: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
name: Swirlix

descript: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
name: Aromatisse

descript: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.
name: Spritzee

descript: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.
name: Furfrou

descript: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human’s, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It’s like it can see with its nose!
name: Slurpuff

descript: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent’s will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
name: Inkay

descript: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
name: Malamar

descript: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
name: Binacle

descript: Barbaracle’s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head’s orders.
name: Barbaracle

descript: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.
name: Skrelp

descript: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.
name: Dragalge

descript: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.
name: Clauncher

descript: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
name: Amaura

descript: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent’s attack.
name: Aurorus

descript: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.
name: Tyrantrum

descript: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
name: Helioptile

descript: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
name: Clawitzer

descript: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.
name: Heliolisk

descript: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.
name: Sylveon

descript: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.
name: Tyrunt

descript: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
name: Hawlucha

descript: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
name: Dedenne

descript: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It’s occasionally found during the excavation of caves.
name: Carbink

descript: It’s covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
name: Goomy

descript: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.
name: Sliggoo

descript: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that’s the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.
name: Goodra

descript: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
name: Klefki

descript: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It’s kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.
name: Trevenant

descript: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
name: Yveltal

descript: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.
name: Bergmite

descript: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.
name: Avalugg

descript: It’s thought to be monitoring the ecosystem. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within it.
name: Zygarde

descript: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
name: Noivern

descript: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
name: Noibat

descript: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
name: Diancie

descript: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
name: Xerneas

descript: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
name: Hoopa

descript: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
name: Volcanion

descript: It throws sharp feathers called blade quills at enemies or prey. It seldom misses.
name: Dartrix

descript: Although basically cool and cautious, when it’s caught by surprise, it’s seized by panic.
name: Decidueye

descript: It doesn’t allow its emotions to be easily seen. Earning its trust takes time. It prefers solitude.
name: Litten

descript: It boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over.
name: Torracat

descript: After hurling ferocious punches and flinging furious kicks, it finishes opponents off by spewing fire from around its navel.
name: Incineroar

descript: This Pokémon can control water bubbles. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.
name: Popplio

descript: It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner, but as it’s diurnal, it never encounters them. This Pokémon boasts incredible patience.
name: Gumshoos

descript: By bending its beak, it can produce a variety of calls and brand itself a noisy nuisance for its neighbors.
name: Trumbeak

descript: It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk, it collapses from exhaustion and falls asleep on the spot.
name: Yungoos

descript: Within its beak, its internal gas ignites, explosively launching seeds with enough power to pulverize boulders.
name: Toucannon

descript: They often gather near places frequented by electric Pokémon in order to avoid being attacked by bird Pokémon.
name: Grubbin

descript: It cares deeply for its companions. When its Trainer is feeling down, it performs a cheery dance to try and help.
name: Brionne

descript: Its singing voice is its chief weapon in battle. This Pokémon’s Trainer must prioritize the daily maintenance of its throat at all costs.
name: Primarina

descript: This Pokémon feeds on berries, whose leftover seeds become the ammunition for the attacks it fires off from its mouth.
name: Pikipek

descript: From the food it digests, it generates electricity, and it stores this energy in its electric sac.
name: Charjabug

descript: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking beams of electrical energy.
name: Vikavolt

descript: It punches so much, its pincers often come off from overuse, but they grow back quickly. What little meat they contain is rich and delicious.
name: Crabrawler

descript: It just throws punches indiscriminately. In times of desperation, it can lop off its own pincers and fire them like rockets.
name: Crabominable

descript: Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the heads of people who have auras resembling those of flowers.
name: Cutiefly

descript: Some of Ribombee’s pollen puffs are highly nutritious. They are sometimes sold as supplements.
name: Ribombee

descript: This Pokémon has lived with people since times long ago. It can sense when its Trainer is in the dumps and will stick close by its Trainer’s side.
name: Rockruff

descript: It’s found crawling on beaches and seafloors. The coral that grows on Corsola’s head is as good as a five-star banquet to this Pokémon.
name: Mareanie

descript: Its heavy, mud-covered kicks are its best means of attack, and it can reduce large trucks to scrap without breaking a sweat.
name: Mudsdale

descript: They give off a sweet and refreshing scent. Cutiefly often gather near the tall grass where Fomantis are hiding.
name: Fomantis

descript: Despite what its appearance suggests, it cares for others. If it finds vulnerable, weak Pokémon, it protectively brings them into its water bubble.
name: Araquanid

descript: As it drowses the day away, it nourishes itself by sucking from tree roots. It wakens at the fall of night, wandering off in search of a new tree.
name: Morelull

descript: It fires beams from its sickle-shaped petals. These beams are powerful enough to cleave through thick metal plates.
name: Lurantis

descript: When it comes across enemies or potential prey, this Pokémon smashes its water-bubble-covered head into them.
name: Dewpider

descript: It has a stubborn, individualistic disposition. Eating dirt, making mud, and playing in the mire all form part of its daily routine.
name: Mudbray

descript: Those attacked by Toxapex’s poison will suffer intense pain for three days and three nights. Post-recovery, there will be some aftereffects.
name: Toxapex

descript: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.
name: Shiinotic

descript: Volcanoes or dry, craggy places are its home. It emanates a sweet-smelling poisonous gas that attracts bug Pokémon, then attacks them.
name: Salandit

descript: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.
name: Salazzle

descript: A touch from anyone except a known friend sends it into a surging frenzy. It’s an incredibly dangerous Pokémon.
name: Stufful

descript: This Pokémon has the habit of hugging its companions. Many Trainers have left this world after their spines were squashed by its hug.
name: Bewear

descript: Although it’s too sugary for human consumption, Bounsweet’s sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.
name: Bounsweet

descript: This Pokémon is always bouncing around energetically. Other Pokémon are attracted by its lively appearance and pleasant aroma.
name: Steenee

descript: A Pokémon known for the beauty of its well-shaped legs, it sometimes appears as a mascot in advertisements for beauty salons.
name: Tsareena

descript: Baths prepared with the flowers from its vine have a relaxing effect, so this Pokémon is a hit with many people.
name: Comfey

descript: Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger, it will gleefully chow down on anything edible, no matter how rotten.
name: Wimpod

descript: They battle with hard berries for weapons. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group, generation upon generation.
name: Passimian

descript: It battles skillfully with its six arms, but spends most of its time peacefully meditating in caves deep beneath the sea.
name: Golisopod

descript: It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth. And so it adds to the accumulation of its sand-mound body.
name: Sandygast

descript: Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.
name: Palossand

descript: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.
name: Oranguru

descript: These Pokémon line the beaches. The sticky mucous that covers their bodies can be used to soothe sunburned skin. How convenient!
name: Pyukumuku

descript: The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.
name: Komala

descript: Although its name was Type: Null at first, the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.
name: Silvally

descript: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.
name: Turtonator

descript: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.
name: Togedemaru

descript: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
name: Drampa

descript: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.
name: Jangmo-o

descript: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they’re regrown.
name: Hakamo-o

descript: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.
name: Kommo-o

descript: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
name: Tapu-fini

descript: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.
name: Tapu-koko

descript: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
name: Tapu-lele

descript: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world.
name: Solgaleo

descript: One of the Ultra Beasts. It’s unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.
name: Nihilego

descript: The guardian deity of Ula’ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.
name: Tapu-bulu

descript: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.
name: Lunala

descript: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.
name: Buzzwole

descript: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
name: Pheromosa

descript: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.
name: Xurkitree

descript: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
name: Celesteela

descript: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.
name: Kartana

descript: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found.
name: Guzzlord

descript: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams.
name: Necrozma

descript: It sinks into the shadows of people and Pokémon, where it can understand their feelings and copy their capabilities.
name: Marshadow

descript: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.
name: Poipole

descript: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.
name: Blacephalon

descript: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.
name: Stakataka

descript: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.
name: Naganadel
